title: Flappy Watch for Android Wear
summary: You can play on both devices (watch and phone).No advertising. Saves battery.

descriptionHTML:
[How to play]
> Tap to your watch to fly.
> Avoid pipes.

Better to play on smart watch. (Motorola Moto 360, Samsung Gear Live, LG G Watch. Sony SmartWatch 3, LG G Watch R)
You can play on both devices (watch and phone).
No advertising. Saves battery.
comments: Garbage on lg urbane! Don't waste your money on this crap get flopsy droid for free
